name: EastCoastRadio
0:
”Alexa, open east coast radio”
”Alexa, play east coast radio”
”Alexa, start east coast radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: east coast radio
des:
East Coast Radio is your ultimate destination for enjoying great music 24/7. With this skill, you can tune in to East Coast Radio and enjoy an uninterrupted musical experience simply by saying, "Alexa, open East Coast Radio."

Key Features:

Music Playback: Access a live stream of East Coast Radio, offering a variety of songs to elevate your day.
Playback Control: Use voice commands like "stop the radio" or "pause the radio" to manage music playback.
Available Commands:

"Alexa, open East Coast Radio"
"Alexa, play East Coast Radio"
"Alexa, start East Coast Radio"
"stop the radio"
"pause the radio"
Restrictions:
The skill requires an active Internet connection to stream music.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
